description:
Mirror oh Mirror: Maron, a Grape flavored Rabbit Zooble is one day looking at the mirror, admiring her image. However, until she saw how overweight she is on the scales, she decided to go to the Rainbow Fountain to drink some slimming water to reduce her weight. At the same time, Chevy and Coron arrived at the park and they all saw her, confusing Chevy and sometimes thinking Coron is cuter than Maron. The next day, Maron is growing jealous and yet....admiring on Coron while hiding on the bushes. However after she fakingly fainted on the fruit she ate, the three were getting suspicious until Blacky shows up.
[b]The Uproar in Kitchen Land:[b] Chevy and Panky called Coron one day as the trio plans to go to the flower fields for their picnic. As they get there and ate, Coron and Panky noticed how bad Chevy`s cooking is and decided to got to Ron`s Restaurant for the food. The three learned that her restaurant didn`t get much customers and the trio decided to invite the others. But when Ron got a problem with the fire used in cooking, they consulted Kumampa for advise on getting the only source of fire.

titles.title: Kagami yo Kagami! / Kitchen Land wa Oosawagi
Mirror oh Mirror! / The Uproar in Kitchen Land
鏡よ鏡! / キッチンランドは大騒ぎ
